summary: If the credit roll of detective pikachu doesn’t have all the pokemon - even/especially the ones in the bg of the whole movie -...
body: If the credit roll of detective pikachu doesn’t have all the pokemon - even/especially the ones in the bg of the whole movie - so the audience can get a better look at all the work that went into making them for the few seconds they were on screen, I will be very sad

summary: a red movie could be unique if they decided not to focus just on the original games. following red in his rise to international...
body:
a red movie could be unique if they decided not to focus just on the original games. following red in his rise to international fame would be interesting, especially if they managed to pull off his silent game persona. he could actually be mute or it could be a botw link type situation where he’s too nervous to talk.

as for a mewtwo movie? I don’t know. I could see it being intriguing if it focuses on a scientist who worked on mewtwo as well, and maybe their attempts to protect their creation despite mewtwo really hating them. but god there’s already so many mewtwo related things, it would have to be a really good premise for me to like it.

not even gonna think about an ash movie. can we just keep him anime exclusive? his movie personality just…wouldn’t work in a more realistic setting.

perhaps a detective pikachu 2 movie would happen? I know the games are open ended and warrant a sequel, but maybe it’ll actually be wrapped up in the first movie. (I’m assuming the focus on gen 1/pikachu trainers is so that people actually recognize it as a pokemon movie, so RIP any later gen games). 

this is totally a pipe dream, but god would Tim and N make a great team-up. if they wanna keep up the talking pokemon thing…N’s ur guy. also N being slightly disturbed by pikachu’s human-like personality and pikachu kinda mocking him while forgetting N can hear him would make a great character arc. Maybe they’re still looking for the dad, and N is looking for the bw protag so they team up. (or plasma’s up to no good again. genesect?)

also looker/interpol movie it’s perfect for after detective pikachu…just do it!

summary: I posted this on Twitter awhile ago (I might even make a full video on this) and I think it’s worth posting here The core...
body:
I posted this on Twitter awhile ago (I might even make a full video on this) and I think it’s worth posting here

The core difference between the Sonic movie and Detective Pikachu and why everyone hates Sonic but loves Pikachu is this: Detective Pikachu didn’t sacrifice the game design for the sake of realism

They didn’t try and make all of the Pokemon resemble ‘real’ animals, they all look like themselves; lifted straight out of the games.

And it would have been EASY for them to just include Pokemon that only look like animals, but they’re also including the Pokemon with weirder designs, like Mr. Mime above, and Golurk, which is literally a rock golem

Now compare this to Sonic…

Sonic went too far in trying to make him a ‘real’ animal, resulting in him looking like a hairy little gremlin. He looks like a human wearing a costume…

Like, look at how Detective Pikachu designed Charmander

This comes from the D. Pikachu line of Pokemon cards btw

Now, what if they tried to make him a “real” animal, he’d end up looking something like..

You see the problem?

You made him a real animal, but he only looks like an approximation of what he’s supposed to look like… that’s why people hate the Sonic movie design so much and why you see so many people trying to fix it online.

There’s this weird fear that a distinctly cartoony design can’t work when you’re trying to put a CG character next to real people and that it HAS to look realistic… and that’s simply not true. it’s been PROVEN not true!

Detective Pikachu gets this, their designs are a perfect middle-ground between realistic and cartoon

Let cartoon characters BE cartoon characters

summary: Detective Pikachu can say “hell” and “damn” so he’s just checking if Red could be PG13 enough for the Red and Blue movie.  Based...
caption:
Detective Pikachu can say “hell” and “damn” so he’s just checking if Red could be PG13 enough for the Red and Blue movie. 

Based off an old comic somewhere on tumblr where Mario is taunted by Wario to curse.

reblog.comment:

summary:
So I looked on the poster and circled all the Pokemon on it (including Pikachu, just the include the lil guy)
So far I can...
body:
So I looked on the poster and circled all the Pokemon on it (including Pikachu, just the include the lil guy)

So far I can see:

Pikachu (duh)

Loudred (very bottom)

Treecko (on the sign that says ‘fool’)

Squirtle (on the building with Treecko, right near him)

Jigglypuff, Bulbasaur and Psyduck (all on the building that Pikachu and Tim are on, in the windows, Psyduck is only peeking out though) (he’s a… peeking duck)

Little group of Emolga (literally they’ve been in every trailer) (also on the Pikachu building, farther to the right almost off of the poster)

Something unknown, possibly Caterpie?? Genuinely not sure. (Also on Pikachu building, just on the side! If anyone knows what it is, tell me!)

Mr. Mime (in the background, his circle is right between the Emolga and the mystery green thing)

Aipom that DON’T look like nightmare creatures! Cuties! (On the actual Detective Pikachu sign, one on top one on the right side)

Charizard, possibly shiny? (Way in the back night sky, took me a while to realize he was there!)

Possible Mewtwo. (On one of the back buildings, hard to make out, could be something else but it could be him, would be a nice reference to OG Mewtwo on the top of a building)

summary: everyone surprised that detective pikachu can say hell in a pg movie is outing themselves as having not seen kubo and the two...
body:
everyone surprised that detective pikachu can say hell in a pg movie is outing themselves as having not seen kubo and the two strings.


This is an opportunity, my friends. Enlighten the masses.

blog.name: artsyrenegade
blog.title: Chromfirmed
blog.description: Kimmy ko. Certified Dumbass. I do art, but Mostly fanart. Fire emblem typically, but i also do, pokemon, Mystery Skulls, LOZ, etc. Typically Traditional art but is getting better at using my “tablet” (aka my ipad). I do commissions but if you want me to draw Chrom or Inigo i will ABSOLUTLY do that shit for free. Twitter is artsyRenegade @SloanKimmy.
